trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Ashburn
There were no other sightings in Ashburn on or around September 19th 2009
Summary: beam of light floating over ashburn,va
divs: Sighting DetailsMy girlfriend and i came home from my birthday dinner as i pulled into the driveway me and my girlfreind saw this bright light shinning down like a big flash light..I do live near Dulles airport but it was very clear out. This was no airplane or chopper. As the light went away it left a white have in the sky then dissappere. The light was out of the ordinary it was beaming down for a little bit then diminished slowly. Ashburn,Va 20147
